column5: We have been fishing the Winnipeg river system in the Minaki area for the past few years and I would be interested in knowing if anybody knows of a good map chip for this area?:raisin:
Depending on your GPS I guess, but I use the BlueChart chip for Garmin. Works well as has nice accuracy. "Slayer"
I am using 2 Lowrance units, LCX 20 and a 5200C unit.

I have the Great Lakes West Map for my LCX19C and 20C's. It provides good detail north and south of Minaki (even better than the government maps). My Ontario Map shows good detail south of Minaki, but poor detail north of Minaki. I believe Navionics is changing some of thier maps around, so you may want to email them to get the latest info. The last time I looked the website, it wasn't clear to me what the best map for the Minaki area north and south of Minaki. Chuck
